title: gaseous
descript: state of aggregation of matter in which, under certain conditions of temperature and pressure, its molecules interact or react weakly with each other.

title: gaseous
descript: state of aggregation of matter in which, under certain conditions of temperature and pressure, its molecules interact or react weakly with each other.

title: plasma
descript: It is a state similar to gas, but composed of ionized atoms, where electrons circulate freely.

title: plasma
descript: It is a state similar to gas, but composed of ionized atoms, where electrons circulate freely.

title: periodic table
descript: It is an arrangement of the chemical elements in table form, ordered by their atomic number,

title: periodic table
descript: It is an arrangement of the chemical elements in table form, ordered by their atomic number,

title: atomic number
descript: It is designated by the letter Z and is indicated in the lower left corner of the chemical compound symbol. The atomic number tells us the number of electrons that revolve around the nucleus.
